MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection CreateStoreSchemaConnection (string providerInvariantName, string connectionString);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection CreateStoreSchemaConnection(string providerInvariantName, string connectionString) cil managed

Docs.param: The invariant name of a provider.
The connection for the providers connection.
Docs.summary: Creates an EntityConnection loaded with the providers metadata for the store schema.
Docs.returns: An EntityConnection that can query the ConceptualSchemaDefinition for the provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection CreateStoreSchemaConnection (string providerInvariantName, string connectionString, Version targetEntityFrameworkVersion);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection CreateStoreSchemaConnection(string providerInvariantName, string connectionString, class System.Version targetEntityFrameworkVersion) cil managed

Docs.param: The connection for the providers connection.
The internal Entity Framework version that is being targeted.
Docs.summary: Creates an EntityConnection loaded with the providers metadata for the store schema. Note that the targetEntityFrameworkVersion parameter uses internal EntityFramework version numbers as described in the class.
Docs.returns: An EntityConnection that can query the ConceptualSchemaDefinition for the provider.
